title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles on Natural Language Processing (NLP
container-title: research focused on Southeast Asian languages, up to 2023

title: **"A Comprehensive Survey on Natural Language Processing for Indonesian Language"** - This article reviews various NLP tasks and challenges specific to the Indonesian language
**"Thai Word Segmentation Based on Deep Learning Techniques"** - This paper explores the application of deep learning methods for segmenting Thai text
**"Vietnamese Named Entity Recognition Using Bidirectional LSTM-CRF"** - This study discusses the use of BiLSTM-CRF models for named entity recognition in Vietnamese
**"A Comparative Study of Tokenization Algorithms for Malay Text"** - This article compares different tokenization techniques for the Malay language
**"Challenges and Solutions in Building a Large-Scale Corpus for Filipino"** - This paper addresses the difficulties and methodologies in creating a comprehensive corpus for Filipino
**"BERT-based Models for Sentiment Analysis in Indonesian Social Media"** - This research applies BERT models to sentiment analysis tasks on Indonesian social media data
**"Khmer Text Classification Using Convolutional Neural Networks"** - This study investigates the use of CNNs for classifying text in the Khmer language
**"A Survey on NLP Tools and Resources for the Burmese Language"** - This article provides an overview of the available NLP tools and resources for Burmese
**"Multilingual Neural Machine Translation for Low-Resource Languages: A Case Study on Lao"** - This paper explores neural machine translation techniques for Lao as a low-resource language
**"Part-of-Speech Tagging for Javanese Using Conditional Random Fields"** - This research focuses on POS tagging for Javanese using CRF models
**"Cross-Lingual Transfer Learning for Sentiment Analysis in Tagalog"** - This study examines the effectiveness of cross-lingual transfer learning for sentiment analysis in Tagalog
**"A Rule-Based Approach to Vietnamese Grammar Correction"** - This article presents a rule-based system for correcting grammatical errors in Vietnamese text
**"Deep Learning Approaches for Named Entity Recognition in Thai"** - This paper discusses various deep learning models for NER tasks in Thai
**"Building a Parallel Corpus for Machine Translation Between English and Malay"** - This study details the creation of a parallel corpus for improving machine translation between English and Malay
**"Language Modeling for Low-Resource Languages: The Case of Cebuano"** - This research investigates language modeling techniques for Cebuano, a low-resource language
**"Automatic Speech Recognition for the Vietnamese Language Using Deep Neural Networks"** - This article explores the application of deep neural networks for ASR in Vietnamese
**"Sentiment Analysis of Filipino Tweets Using Transformer-Based Models"** - This paper applies transformer models to sentiment analysis tasks on Filipino tweets
**"Named Entity Recognition for Khmer Using Transfer Learning"** - This study utilizes transfer learning for improving NER in the Khmer language
**"A Comparative Study of Machine Translation Techniques for Thai-English"** - This article compares different machine translation methods for translating between Thai and English
**"Challenges in Developing NLP Tools for Low-Resource Languages: Insights from Lao"** - This paper discusses the specific challenges faced in developing NLP tools for Lao and potential solutions
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the current state of NLP research for Southeast Asian languages
